other_tests.findings: Outbursts of theta waves, generalized seizures in Patient 1; multifocal seizures in Patient 2.
Glutamine levels: Patient 1 - 11 µmol/liter; Patient 2 - 12 µmol/liter. Normal range for both: Patient 1 (352–885 µmol/liter), Patient 2 (520–1280 µmol/liter).

Patient 1: serum glutamine not detectable (normal range: 433–619 µmol/liter), urine glutamine not detectable (normal range: 52–205 mmol/mol creatinine); Patient 2: serum glutamine 6 µmol/liter (normal; 300–800 µmol/liter), urine 8 µmol/g creatinine (normal range: 640–3230 µmol/g).
